definition: relating to or consisting of 1000, a sum or aggregate of one thousand (especially one thousand years)
details:
adjective
- relating to or consisting of 1000
- of or relating to the doctrine of the millennium
noun
- a sum or aggregate of one thousand (especially one thousand years)
- a span of 1000 years
= synonyms: millennium
- the 1000th anniversary (or the celebration of it)
= synonyms: millennium
